home.parrafo-info: I am a web developer passionate about technology, focused on creating intuitive and functional user interfaces. My current focus is frontend development, but I am constantly learning to expand my skills towards full-stack development. I strive to maintain clean and well-structured code, always looking to improve the quality of the final product. I deeply value teamwork and collaboration, as I believe the best solutions come from the exchange of ideas and cooperation. I am committed to my professional growth and delivering innovative, high-quality solutions.

sobre-mi.title: About Me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi: I am a passionate web development student, always seeking new challenges and opportunities to continue learning. I consider myself a proactive person, with strong problem-solving skills and the ability to adapt to new technologies. My focus is on creating efficient and collaborative solutions, and I am always looking to improve both my technical skills and interpersonal competencies.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: A landing page designed to promote an expedition to the Andes, highlighting destinations like Aconcagua, Fitz Roy, and Torres del Paine. An attractive and functional design for a unique experience.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: A watch e-commerce with a carefully curated selection of models presented clearly and attractively to facilitate exploration.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: 2048 is a game where you combine numbered blocks until you reach 2048. It’s played on a 4x4 grid, and the goal is to avoid filling the board so you can’t move anymore.
